# drawInsertionPoint(in:color:turnedOn:)

**Instance Method**

Draws or erases the insertion point.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func drawInsertionPoint(in rect: NSRect, color: NSColor, turnedOn flag: Bool)
```

## Parameters

- **rect**: The rectangle in which to draw the insertion point.
- **color**: The color with which to draw the insertion point.
- **flag**: [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to draw the insertion point, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to erase it.

## Discussion

The focus must be locked on the receiver when this method is invoked. You should not need to invoke this method directly.

## Related Documentation

- **backgroundColor**: The receiver’s background color.
- **lockFocus()**: Locks the focus on the view, so subsequent commands take effect in the view’s window and coordinate system.
- **insertionPointColor**: The color of the insertion point.
